ComicInfo.Summary:
The Pollution Monsters: Satan invents a special fuel that, when mixed with pollution, spawns pollution monsters.
Master of the Dead!: An insane man raises the dead soldiers from a military cemetery who turn on him when he wants them to help him rule the world.
Dance Macabre: A couple perform a forbidden dance ritual for their theater act which angers the nearby restless spirits.
Orgy of Blood: A man is chained to a bed and is forced to be living food for a vampire woman and her daughter and mother.
Help Us to Die!: A greedy man and his female friend steal the magic elixir from a living mummy in order to have eternal life. They become mummies themselves.
The Thing from the Sea!: A man murders his rival by throwing him off a ship. The victim returns as a waterlogged zombie looking for revenge.
The Creature Within!: A playwright conjures up a monster during his play that kills him.
The Deadly Mark of the Beast!: A werewolf is prowling the nearby moors killing the townsfolk.
